category.name: Active Workspace.Substance Compliance IMDS Integration
category.category_description: Substance Compliance IMDS Integration Active Workspace preferences

preference.name: Sci0ItemRevHelperObject.sci0MeasuredWeight.FORMATSTRING
preference.preference_description: Specifies the format used to display the value of the property "sci0MeasuredWeight" for objects of type "Sci0ItemRevHelperObject". The default value is "##.####", where "#" indicates a digit. It will be displayed if it adds to the accuracy of the number but not if it is a leading zero or a zero at the end of a decimal.
